channel.title: Inoculate feels less useful now
channel.description:
So inoculate was a situational ability originally but could be useful but I feel as though it’s usege has been drastically reduced This is because assassin and cl only have 3 charges of poison/bleed now it has less use than before
Tell me your thoughts is inoculate still good or does it need a change

item.title: Inoculate feels less useful now
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
It’s perfectly fine as well, it’s a good Ability if used right.

Read full topic
